name: Soko-Bulb
description:
Might be slow to load on some browsers!

<---SOKO-BULB--->

An electrifying puzzle platformer inspired by the original Sokoban from 1982!

Get the battery block to the light bulb before the timer runs out, but be careful, you only have a limited charge of your torch, which you can turn on and off to conserve power. Don't let your charge run flat, or you won't be able to see a thing!

<---CONTROLS--->

Arrow Keys : Move

Z : Turn Light On and Off, Interact In Menus

R : Restart Level

Esc : Return to Level Select

<---MECHANICS--->

Only read if you need help with any of the mechanics!!!

  : You!

  : The  battery block you need to push to the light bulb

  : The light bulb you need to charge

  : A conveyor belt that will move the block but not the player

  : A recharge station for the players charge that only works if the battery block is connected to the top of it

  : Acts as a one way wall for the battery block, and a normal wall for the player

  : Acts as a one way wall for the player, but doesn't block the battery block

  : Blocks the player unless they have full charge
